description: Creates a cross-account shared resource. The resource owner makes an offer to share the resource with the principal subscriber (an AWS user with a different account than the resource owner). The following resources support cross-account sharing:

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the resource to be shared.

parameters.name: principalSubscriber
parameters.description: The principal subscriber is the account being offered shared access to the resource.

nested_items.name: shareId
nested_items.description: The ID that HealthOmics generates for the share.
